RSA, ECDSA, EdDSA for C, Common Lisp.


# 1. Compile

## FreeBSD, Linux

Debug mode.

```
$ cc *.c
$ ./a.out
```

Release mode.

```
$ cc -DFIXED_RELEASE *.c
$ ./a.out
```

Example

```

[sign] "Hello"

secp256k1: T
```
